ValidationRule.description: Limits all non Professional and Business Development engagements to 20 Characters to support Naming conventions for those other record types
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
NOT(OR (RecordType.Name = "Business Development", RecordType.Name = "Professional Development") ),
LEN(Descriptor__c)>20 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Descriptor cannot be more than 20 characters for this type of Engagement
